tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Our journey with Kritika Mam is 6 years old now. From day 1 our son is her patient. She is a living god in our life. We had gone through very difficult phases and her treatment, diagnosis and excellent guided medications has enabled us to grow our child. We are still associated and we will be with her always. *** ** *** **** ****** ** **********

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review:
Nothing very negative but she shows very casual behavior,  I think one should avoid this kind of doctors.
We pay high fee and if doctor is not able to explain the issue and cannot listen the patient patiently then  we feel very disappointed. Will not recommend to anyone.

Had visited her for vaccination last month. After paying the consultation charges vaccination wasn’t done because it could induce fever and my son has some exams coming up. She wrote some multivitamins and asked us to come for vaccination later and we need not pay the consultation charges again. When we went again after couple of weeks she asked us to pay the consultation charges once again as the last visit was for illness. When I pointed out that It was clearly written on the consultation sheet that we came for vaccination last time and multivitamins she wrote was something she did on her own. She behaved very rude with us. I felt very insulted. I would not advice anyone to visit her ** ****  ****** ***** ** ******* *** **********
